## ğŸš€ Instant Deployment Options

### Option 1: Netlify (Easiest)
1. Go to netlify.com
2. Drag the `BoltCryptoFlasher-Website.tar.gz` file to the deploy area
3. Get instant HTTPS domain - your site goes live immediately

### Option 2: Vercel 
1. Extract the `BoltCryptoFlasher-Website.tar.gz` file
2. Upload to vercel.com
3. Automatic SEO optimization and global CDN

### Option 3: GitHub Pages (Free)
1. Create new GitHub repository 
2. Upload the `website-build/` contents
3. Enable Pages in repository settings

### Option 4: Any Web Host
Upload the contents of `website-build/` to your hosting provider's public folder.
